lore: This war machine was created by the legendary Helmholtz at the time of Rodia's Unification War. Devoid of feelings, the Iron Golem crushes its enemies without mercy, leaving in their corpses the characteristic mark of its sharp fists. Its true strength, however, lies in its versatility, though not all Magi know how to capitalize on this advantage.
menagerieDialog: (It's so still that you're not even sure it's still alive.)
(This creature has the best of intentions, but it always seems to be clumsily knocking things over.)
(Perhaps someday, you'll be able to take the time to teach it how to talk.)
(Its facial expressions are difficult to read. You can't help but think that it's judging you sometimes.)
name: Iron Golem
